select t.id, t.id_code, t.customs_code, t.hs_code, t.ch_name, t.en_name, t.texture, t.uses, t.declare_elements, t.declare_price, t.suggest_price, t.cid, t.suttle, t.suttle_unit, t.gross_weight, t.gross_unit, t.tariff_tax, t.raise_hscode, t.raise_tax, t.weight_tax, t.weight_tariff_unit, t.weight_unit, t.pic_url, t.status, t.user_id, t.user_name, t.create_time, t.additional_duty, t.sales_tax, t.sundry_tax, t.brand, t.specification, t.audit_status, t.audit_user_id, t.audit_user_name from customs_clearance t WHERE 1 = 1
